concept.title: GCPERPENDICULAR Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a perpendicular geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a perpendicular constraint to ensure linear entities remain perpendicular to each other.

section.title: Methods to create a perpendicular constraint
section.p:
There is one method to begin creating a perpendicular constraint:
Select first entity

dlentry.dd: Begin creating a perpendicular constraint by selecting a linear entity then:
Select a second linear entity to make perpendicular to the first. The first entity maintains its position while the second entity moves, as necessary, to become perpendicular to the first entity.
